hero.title: Astro Component Demo
hero.subtitle: A high-performance Astro 5.0 + Cloudflare Workers template featuring an Edge-Native Internationalization Engine with a 0 KB client bundle.
hero.description: Unlike traditional setups that ship heavy JSON dictionaries to the client, this architecture stores translations in Cloudflare KV, fetches only the locale required by the user or browser, loads only the specific namespaces needed for each page or component via a single batch request, and serves pre-rendered HTML, which is cached to reduce KV requests.

features.title: The cards below are the React Islands
features.feature1Desc: Translations are fetched at the edge in a single KV batch request, with 0 KB client bundle and sub-10ms access to the exact locale and namespaces required for the page.
features.feature2Desc: No duplicated pages like /en/about.astro, /es/about.astro, etc. Locales and translation namespaces are resolved dynamically per request, keeping routing clean and the project easy to maintain.
features.feature3Desc: Translation types are auto-generated from your src/locales JSON files, ensuring a fully type-safe i18n schema across Astro and React Islands â€” with built-in IntelliSense and compile-time guarantees.

builtWith.title: Built With
builtWith.subtitle: Edge-native stack combining Astro, React Islands, Cloudflare Workers & KV, Tailwind CSS, and Shadcn/ui.
